name: 3D ROBOTS LAST MISSION
description:
3D ROBOT'S LAST MISSION is finally being released on iOS , after the success it brought on Steam we've decided to fully publish on iOS and remove from Steam. We hope you guys enjoy!


Far away for some time 3D Robot has been lost, trying to complete his mission, in which took him 48 years to travel across his Galaxy to the Planet Mars. He finally reached incoming distance to Mars but he shortly finds out he's not alone. 3D ROBOT has to battle his way through oncoming UFO CRAFTS!

Features

*Use swipe controls to take control of 3D ROBOT

*You can use the SHOOT button to launch duel missiles into the oncoming UFO'S

*FULL 3D WORLD GRAPHICS

*No Ads & No in-app purchase

*Perfect for any age!
